statements: SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_id ASC;
SELECT order_id, estimated_delivery_time FROM orders WHERE distance > 10;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE traffic_conditions = 'Heavy traffic' ORDER BY estimated_delivery_time DESC;
SELECT order_id, distance, estimated_delivery_time FROM orders WHERE distance < 5 AND traffic_conditions = 'Light traffic';
SELECT order_id, traffic_conditions FROM orders WHERE distance BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY traffic_conditions ASC;
SELECT order_id, distance, traffic_conditions, estimated_delivery_time FROM orders WHERE distance > 100 AND traffic_conditions = 'Heavy traffic' ORDER BY estimated_delivery_time DESC
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE estimated_delivery_time < '10:00:00' AND traffic_conditions IN ('Heavy traffic', 'Moderate traffic')
SELECT order_id, distance, estimated_delivery_time FROM orders WHERE distance BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY distance DESC
SELECT order_id, distance, traffic_conditions FROM orders WHERE traffic_conditions LIKE '%traffic'
SELECT order_id, estimated_delivery_time FROM orders WHERE estimated_delivery_time > '12:00:00'
SELECT * FROM order_info;
SELECT order_id, distance, estimated_delivery_time FROM order_info;
SELECT order_id, traffic_info FROM order_info WHERE distance > 10;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE current_traffic_level > 2;
SELECT order_id, traffic_conditions FROM traffic_data WHERE traffic_time_estimation > NOW();
SELECT * FROM order_info JOIN traffic_data ON order_info.order_id = traffic_data.order_id WHERE order_info.distance > 10 ORDER BY order_info.estimated_delivery_time DESC
SELECT order_id, traffic_info, current_traffic_level FROM order_info LEFT JOIN traffic_data ON order_info.order_id = traffic_data.order_id WHERE current_traffic_level > 3
SELECT order_id, traffic_info, traffic_time_estimation FROM order_info JOIN traffic_data ON order_info.order_id = traffic_data.order_id WHERE traffic_conditions LIKE '%heavy%'
SELECT order_id, distance, current_traffic_level FROM order_info JOIN traffic_data ON order_info.order_id = traffic_data.order_id WHERE current_traffic_level < 2 AND distance < 5
SELECT order_id, SUM(current_traffic_level) AS total_traffic_level FROM order_info JOIN traffic_data ON order_info.order_id = traffic_data.order_id GROUP BY order_id HAVING total_traffic_level > 10
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '+123456789';
SELECT traffic_point, traffic_level FROM traffic_data ORDER BY traffic_level ASC;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT order_id, distance, estimated_delivery_time FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, distance, traffic_conditions, estimated_delivery_time FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE distance > 5.0 AND traffic_conditions = 'Heavy Traffic' ORDER BY estimated_delivery_time DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, address FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE c.customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT customer_id, AVG(distance) AS avg_distance FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_distance > 3.0;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_id FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT order_id, delivery_address FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM distances ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT order_id, traffic_condition FROM traffic_data WHERE traffic_time > 30;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT order_id, delivery_address FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT order_id, distance FROM distances ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT order_id, traffic_condition, traffic_time FROM traffic_data WHERE traffic_time > 30;
SELECT * FROM delivery_times WHERE estimated_delivery_time < NOW();
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, delivery_address FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, delivery_address FROM orders WHERE order_id = 100;
SELECT order_id, delivery_address FROM orders WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM distances ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, delivery_address FROM orders WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT order_id, timestamp FROM traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT orders.order_id, delivery_address, estimated_time FROM orders JOIN estimated_delivery_time ON orders.order_id = estimated_delivery_time.order_id;
SELECT order_id, status FROM delivery_status WHERE status IN ('In Progress', 'Delayed') ORDER BY order_id ASC;
